titles.title: To award a congressional gold medal to Lou Rawls.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E678)
Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Credit and Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 3/17/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the President, on behalf of the Congress, to present a gold medal to Lou Rawls in recognition of his work on behalf of educational opportunities for African Americans. Authorizes appropriations. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to provide for the sale of bronze duplicates of the medal.
